definition: slices of bread that have been toasted, make brown and crisp by heating
details:
noun
- slices of bread that have been toasted
- a drink in honor of or to the health of a person or event
= synonyms: pledge
- a person in desperate straits
= synonyms: goner
- a celebrity who receives much acclaim and attention
= example: a celebrity who receives much acclaim and attention
verb
- make brown and crisp by heating
= example: make brown and crisp by heating
= synonyms: crisp
- propose a toast to
= example: propose a toast to
= synonyms: drink
